profile.name: Sai Kumar Gurugubelli
profile.introText: A passionate and results-driven freelance web developer dedicated to building robust and scalable web applications.

story.heading: My Story
paragraphs: Driven by a passion for crafting efficient and scalable web solutions, I've honed my skills in backend development and full-stack technologies.
I specialize in building robust APIs, designing efficient databases, and leveraging cloud services to deliver high-performing applications.
My goal is to help businesses establish a strong online presence and achieve their objectives through innovative web solutions.

degrees.title: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

contact.heading: Let's Connect
contact.text: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out!
